text: Hagi antahiho, ainireti'ma agigu agigu zama tro'ma nehaza vahera Nagra'a nazampinti zamazeri fore hu'noe. Ana hunoge'za ana ainia tevefi krete'za runtrantru ahe'za ha'ma huzantamina tro hunage'za ana zanteti hara nehaze. Ana hu'noanki'na ana ha' zantamina eri'nezama ha'ma hu'za mago'a vahe'ma zamazeri havizama nehaza sondia vahera Nagra zamazeri fore hu'noe.
